sourceMeaningMnemonic: Watch what you <radical>say</radical> to the <radical>next</radical> <radical>mouth</radical> over, because they hired you to <kanji>consult</kanji> them.
meaningInfo: The person with the next mouth in the room is waiting for you to open yours to consult them. He'll do whatever you say.
readingMnemonic: You panic, and <kanji>consult</kanji> the man into buying a <reading>shee</reading>p (<ja>し</ja>).
readingInfo: He was asking for love advice, so I guess you consulted that he give a sheep to the person he likes? Uh oh. Remind me never to consult with you when I'm feeling unsure about things.
